sentence.Network_en: Gordon: I love shoot - em up Westerns. They have great action and adventure.
sentence.Network_cn: 戈登: 我喜欢西部片里的枪战. 他们的动作和冒险都很棒.

sentence.Network_en: Exciting shoot'em up phases in an armored four - wheel drive vehicle.
sentence.Network_cn: 激动人心的射击阶段,逐步采用装甲设备.

sentence.Network_en: Experience the thrill of intense space racing action and death defying shoot - em up!
sentence.Network_cn: 体验紧张刺激的赛车行动空间和死亡不畏枪战时间了!
